Translations.Text: sihamte ki bisaye parasparae sodha-poca karai ache
mahasambadatora bisaye
yi bisaye sihamte matanaikya karaiche
Ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba
Tarapichata, ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba
Ami prthiraikhanaka sayya banoraa na'ine
arau parbatasamuhaka peraeka
arau ami tomalokaka srsti karaicho yoraa-yoraa
Arau tomalokara topanika karaicho bisraama
Arau raatika karai dicho ararana
Arau dinaka karai dicho jiraika uparjanara samaya
Arau ami tomalokara oparata nirmana karaicho sudrrha satakhana akasa
Arau ami srsti karaicho eti ujjala pradipa
Arau ami barsana karaicho meghamalara paraa pracura pani
Yate tara dbaraa ami utpanna karaiba parao sasya arau udbhida
Arau ghana sannibista udyana
Niscaya nirdharaita ache bicarara dina
Se'i dina sinata phum diya ha’ba tetiya tomaloke dale dale ahiba
Arau akasakhana khuli diya ha’ba, phalata i ha’ba bahu duraarabisista
Arau parbatasamuhaka calita karaa ha’ba, phalata se'ibora hai yaba balimaya maraicikara darae
Niscaya jahannama khapa pati raai ache
Simalanghanakarai sakalara babe pratyarartanasthala
Tata sihamte yuga yuga dharai arasthana karaiba
Tata sihamte sitalata ba upayukta pani'o bhoga karaiba noraaraiba
Utala pani arau durgandhamaya pumjara bahirae
E'itorae'i upayukta pratiphala
Niscaya sihamte ketiya'o hicaba-nikacara asa karaa nachila
Arau sihamte amara nidarsanaralika kathorabharae mithyaraopa karaichila
Arau ami pratito bastu likhitabharae samraksana karai raakhicho
Eteke bhoga karaa, ami tomalokara babe sastira bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakarao
Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe ache saphalata
Udyanasamuha arau angurasamuha
Arau samabayasiya uda`bhinna nara-yurati tarauni
Arau paraipurna panapatra
Tata te'omloke kono anarthaka katha arau micha bakya'o suna napaba
Aponara pratipalakara phalara paraa puraskara, yathocita danasbaraupa
Yijana akasasamuha arau prthirai arau e'i dutara majata yi ache sakalorae pratipalaka, parama karaunamaya, te'omra ocarata abedana-nibedanara sakti sihamtara karao nathakiba
Se'idina rauha arau phiraistasakala saraibad'dhabharae thiya ha’ba; rahamane yaka anumati diba tara bahirae kone'o katha naka’ba, arau te'om sathika katha ka’ba
E'i dinato satya, eteke yara iccha siye tara pratipalakara ocarata asraya grahana karaka
Niscaya ami tomalokaka ati nikatararti sasti samparke satarka karailo. Yidina manuhe nija krtakarma dekhibalai paba arau kaphirae ka’ba, haya! Ma'i yadi mati ha'lohemtena
Sapata nirmamabharae utpatanakaraisakalara
Arau mrdubharae bandhanamuktakaraisakalara
Arau tibragatita samturai phuraasakalara
Arau drautagatita agabarhi yoraasakalara
Tara pichata yaratiya kama nirbahakaraisakalara
Se'idina kampanakaraiye prakampita karaiba
Taka anusarana karaiba parabarti kampanakarai
Se'idina kichumana hrdaya, bhayata santrasta ha’ba
Sihamtara drstisamuha atankita hai nata ha’ba
Sihamte kaya, ‘ami akau agara arasthata ubhati yama ne
yetiya ami curnabicurna asthita parainata hama’
sihamte kaya, ‘yadi e'itorae haya tente e'ito eta ksatikara pratyarartana’
Prakrtate e'ito eta biraata sabda
Tatksanata bhu-prsthata sihamtara abirbhara ha’ba
Muchara ghatanato tumi pa'ichane
yetiya te'omra pratipalake te'omka paraitra turaa upatyakata mati kaichila
‘phira'a'unara ocaralai yoraa niscaya si simalanghana karaiche
tara pichata taka koraa ‘tumi paraitra ha’ba bicaraa ne
arau ma'i tomaka tomara pratipalakara pine pathapradarsana karao, yate tumi te'omka bhaya karaa’
Tara pichata, te'om taka maha nidarsana dekhuraale
Kintu si asbikara karaile arau aman'ya karaile
Tara pichata te'om si pichaphale ubhati pratibidhanata sacesta ha’la
Tara pichata sakaloke ekatraita karai ghosana karaile
arau ka’le, ‘maye tomalokara sarbocca pratipalaka’
Arasesata allahe taka akhiraata arau prthiraira drstantamulaka sasti pradana karaile
Niscaya yiye bhaya karae tara babe iyata siksa ache
Tomalokaka srsti karaato kathina ne akasa srsti karaa kathina? Teraemi iyaka nirmana karaiche
Teraemi iyara calakhanaka su'ucca karaiche arau subin'yasta karaiche
Arau teraemi iyara raatika karaiche andhakara arau prakasa karaiche purbahnara pohara
Tara pichata, te'om prthiraikhanaka bistrta karaiche
Teraemi tara paraa uliya'iche pani arau trnabhumi
arau parbatasamuhaka teraemi sthapana karaiche
e'ibora tomalokara arau tomalokara gharaciya jantuborara babe jiranopakarana sbaraupa
Arau yidina mahasankata upasthita ha’ba
se'idina manuhe smarana karaiba yito si (bigata dinata) karaiche
arau jahannama prakasa karaa ha’ba drstimana lokasakalara babe
Eteke yiye simalanghana karae
arau prthiraira jiranaka agraadhikara diye
Niscaya jahanname'i ha’ba tara abasasthala
Arau yiye tara pratipalakara sanmukhata thiya ha’balai bhaya karae arau kuprabrttira paraa nijake birata raakhe
niscaya jannate'i ha’ba tara abasasthala
Sihamte tomaka kiyamata samparke prasna karae ye, i ketiya sanghatita ha’ba
se'ito alocana karaara (prakrta) jnana tomara achene
iyara prakrta jnana (kerala) tomara pratipalakara ocarata
yiye iyaka bhaya karae tumi kerala tara babe satarkakarai
Yidina sihamte iyaka dekhiba se'idina sihamtara e'ito dharana haba ye, sihamte prthiraita kerala eta sandhiya athaba eta prabhatatakai bechi samaya arasthana karaa nachila
Te'om birakta prakasa karaile arau mukha ghuraa'i la’le
te'omra ocarata andha byaktijana ahara karane
Kihe tomaka janaba ye, hayato si paraisud'dha ha’ba
athaba upadesa grahana karaiba arau se'i upadesa tara babe labhajanaka ha’ba
Arau yiye nijake amukhapeksi buli bharae
tumi tara prati manoyoga dicha
Athaca si paraisud'dha naha’le tomara kono dayitba na'i
anahate yiye tomara ocaralai daurai ahile
arau si (allahaka) bhayo karae
tara prati tumi udasina ha’la
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'ito upadesa bani
gatike yiye iccha karaiba siye'i iyaka smarana raakhiba
e'ito maryada sampanna chahiphata lipibad'dha
Samunnata, paraitra
lekhaka ba dutasakalara hatata
(Yisakala) mahasanmanita, punyabana
Manuha dhbansa ha'omka, kimana ye akrtajna
te'om taka ki bastura paraa srsti karaiche
sukrabindura paraa, te'om taka srsti karaiche, pichata tara paraimita bikasa sadhana karaiche
tara pichata tara babe patha sahaja karai diche
tara pichata taka mrtyu pradana karaile arau kabarastha karaile
Akau yetiya te'om iccha karaiba taka punarjiraita karaiba
Ketiya'o nahaya, te'om taka yi adesa karaichila seya si etiya'o purna karaa na'i
Eteke manuhe nija khadyara prati laksya karaa ucita
Niscaya ami pracura paraimane pani barsana karaom
Tara pichata ami prthiraika yathayathabharae bidirna karaom
tara pichata ami tata utpanna karaom sasya
anura arau saka-pacali
yayatuna arau khejura gacha
ghana gacha-gachani bisista udyana
phala-mula arau trna-ghamha
e'ibora tomalokara arau tomalokara gharaciya jantura jiranopakaranara babe
Eteke yetiya tiksna sabda ahiba
se'idina manuhe palayana karaiba tara bhatrra paraa
arau tara maka-bapekara paraa
tara strai arau santanara paraa
se'idina sihamta pratyakarae ha’ba ene eka gurautara arastha yito taka sampurnaraupe byasta raakhiba
Se'idina kichumana ceheraa ha’ba ujjbala
hamhirae bharaa, anandata utphulla
arau se'idina kichumana ceheraa dhulirae malina ha’ba
ka’la ararane ararai dharaiba
E'omloke'i kaphira, atyanta papi
Suryaka yetiya nisprabha karaa ha’ba
arau naksatraraaji yetiya khahi paraiba
parbatasamuhaka yetiya sancalita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya purna gabhini utaboraka ayatne erai diya ha’ba
arau yetiya banaraiya pasuboraka ekatraita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya sagarasamuhaka agni'uttala karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya atmasamuhaka (samagotraiyasakalara lagata) milita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya jiranta samadhistha kan'yasisuka sodha ha’ba
ki aparaadhata ta'ika hatya karaa haichila
arau yetiya amalanamasamuha unmocita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya akasara ararana apasaraita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya jahannamaka bhisanabharae prajjbalita karaa ha’ba
arau jannataka yetiya nikatabarti karaa ha’ba
tetiya pratyeka byaktiye'i janiba si ki upasthita karaiche
Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho arartanasila naksatraborara
yibora gatisila, adrsya
arau raatira sapata yetiya i bidaya laya
arau prabhatara sapata yetiya iyara abirbhara haya
niscaya e'i kora'ana sanmanita raachule lai aha bani
Yijana saktisali, arasbara malikara ocarata maryadasampanna
man'yabara, tata te'om bisbasta
Arau tomalokara sangi unmada nahaya
arau te'om te'omka spasta digantata dekhiche
Arau te'om gayebi bisaya samparke krpanali'o nakarae
Arau eya kono abhisapta cayatanarao bakya nahaya
Eteke tomaloke konaphale gati karaicha
e'ito kerala samagra jagatabasira babe upadesa bani
tara babe, tomalokara majara yiye sarala pathata caliba bicarae
Tomaloke iccha karaiba noraaraa, yetiya laike bisbajagatara pratipalaka allahe iccha nakarae
Yetiya akasakhana bidirna ha’ba
arau yetiya naksatrasamuha biksiptabharae khahi paraiba
arau yetiya sagarasamuhaka bisphoraita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya kabarasamuhaka unmocita karaa ha’ba
tetiya pratyeke'i janiba, si ki agalai pathiya'iche arau pichata ki raakhi ahiche
He manara! Kihe tomaka tomara pratipalaka samparke bibhraanta karaiche
yijane tomaka srsti karaiche, tara pichata tomaka suthama karaiche arau susamanjasya karaiche
arau yi akrtita bicaraiche, te'om tomaka (se'i akrtite) gathana karaiche
Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke pratidana dirasaka asbikara karaa
arau niscaya tomalokara oparata niyojita ache samraksakadala
sanmanita lekhaka brnda
tomaloke yi karaa seya te'omloke jane
Niscaya satkarmaparaayanasakala thakiba parama sukha-santita
Arau niscaya papisakala thakiba jahannamata
Sihamte pratidana dirasata tata praraesa karaiba
arau sihamte tara paraa anupasthita thakiba noraaraiba
Arau tomaka kihe janaba ye, pratidana dirasa ki
akau kaicho, kihe tomaka janaba pratidana dirasa ki
se'idina kone'o karao babe eko karaara ksamata naraakhiba; arau se'idina sakalo bisayara kartrtba ha’ba allahara
Dhbansa sihamtara babe yihamte jokha-makhata kama diye
yihamte anara paraa mapi la'omte purnamatraata grahana karae
arau yetiya sihamtaka mapi diye athaba ojana karai diye, tetiya kama diye
Sihamte bisbasa nakarae neki ye, sihamta puranaraut'thita ha’ba
mahadirasata
Yidina sakalo manuhe bisbajagatara pratipalakara sanmukhata thiya ha’ba
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya papisakalara amalanama chijjinata ache
Arau kihe tomaka janaba chijjina ki
cihnita amalanama
Se'idina dhbansa asbikarakaraisakalara babe
yihamte pratidana dirasaka asbikara karae
Arau kerala pratyeka papistha simalanghanakaraira bahirae ana kone'o iyaka asbikara nakarae
Arau yetiya amara ayatasamuha tara ocarata tilarata karaa haya tetiya si kaya, (eya haiche) ‘purbarartisakalara upakatha’
Ketiya'o nahaya, sihamtara karmara phalata sihamtara antarata mamara dharaiche
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya sihamta se'idina nija pratipalakara paraa pardara amrata thakiba
Tara pichata niscaya sihamte prajjbalita jahannamata praraesa karaiba
tara pichata koraa ha’ba, ‘e'itorae se'ito yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya punyabanalokasakalara amalanama thakiba illiyyinata
Arau kihe tomaka janaba illiyyina ki
cihnita amalanama
Sannidhyapraaptasakale'i iyara abalokana karae
Niscaya punyabanasakale'i thakiba parama sukha-santita
susajjita asanata bahi darsana karaiba
Tumi sihamtara mukhamandalata sukha-santira ujjalata dekhibalai paba
sihamtaka mohara marai thoraa bisud'dha paniya pana karaoraa ha’ba
arau yara mohara ha'ba michakara, seye e'i bisaye pratiyogisakale pratiyogita karaa ucita
Arau iyara misrana ha’ba tachanimara
(se'ito) eta nijaraa, yara paraa sannidhyasakale pana karaiba
Niscaya yihamte aparaadha karaiche sihamte muminasakalaka upahasa karaichila
arau yetiya sihamte muminasakalara ocaraedi gaichila tetiya sihamte caku tipi bidraupa karaichila
Arau yetiya sihamte aponajanara ocaralai ubhati ahichila tetiya utphallita hai ubhatichila
arau sihamte yetiya muminasakalaka dekhichila tetiya kaichila, ‘niscaya ihamta pathabhrasta’
Athaca sihamtaka muminasakalara tattbabadhayaka hicape pathoraa horaa na'i
Eteke aji muminasakale upahasa karaiba kaphirasakalaka
Susajjita asanata bahi sihamte ca'i thakiba
Kaphirasakale sihamtara krtakarmara phala palene
yetiya akasa bidirna ha’ba
arau tara pratipalakara adesa palana karaiba arau e'itorae tara karaniya
Arau yetiya prthiraika samprasaraita karaa ha’ba
Arau prthiraiye tara bhitarata thaka sakalobora bahiralai niksepa karaiba arau i garbhasun'ya hai paraiba
Arau tara pratipalakara adesa palana karaiba arau e'itorae tara karaniya
He manara! Tumi tomara pratipalakara naikatya pabalai kathora paraisrama karaiba lagiba, tetiyahe te'omra saksata labha karaiba paraiba
Eteke yara amalanama tara som hatata diya haba
atyanta sahaja bharae tara hicapa-nikaca loraa ha’ba
Arau si tara aponajanara ocaralai praphullacitte ubhati yaba
arau yara amalanama pichaphalara paraa diya ha’ba
si nijara dhbansa ahbana karaiba
arau si jbalanta ju'ita praraesa karaiba
niscaya si nija paraiyalara majata anandata achila
niscaya si bhabichila ye, si ketiya'o ubhati nayaba
haya, niscaya tara pratipalaka tara oparata samyaka drsti danakarai
Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho pascima akasara rana kiranara
raatira sapata arau i yiborara samabesa ghataya
arau candrara sapata, yetiya i purnata labha karae
arasya'i tomaloke eta starara paraa ana eta staralai araohana karaiba
Kintu sihamtara ki ha’la, sihamte imana posana nakarae kiya
arau yetiya sihamtara ocarata kora'ana tilaraata karaa haya tetiya sihamte chajada nakarae kiya
baram kaphirasakale asbikara karae
Arau sihamte (antarata) yi posana karae allahe se'i bisaye sabisesa aragata
Seye tumi sihamtaka yantranadayaka sastira sambada diya
kintu yisakale imana ane arau satkarma karae te'omlokara babe ache nirabicchinna pratidana
Sapata buraujabisista akasara
sapata pratisrautikrta dinara
sapata drasta arau drstara
abhisapta haichila agnikundara adhipatisakala
ya’ta achila indhanapurna ju'i
Yetiya sihamta iyara kasata upabista achila
Arau sihamte muminasakalara lagata yi karaichila seya pratyaksa karaichila
Arau sihamte te'omlokaka niryatana karaichila kerala e'i karane ye, te'omloke imana anichila paraakramasali arau prasansara yogya allahara oparata
yara adhikarata ache akasa arau prthiraira sarbabhauma kartrtba; arau allaha sakalo bastura pratyaksadarsi
Niscaya yihamte mumina purausa arau mumina naraika bipadapanna karaiche tara pichata ta'oba karaa na'i, sihamtara babe ache jahannamara sasti, arau sihamtara babe ache dahana yantrana
Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche te'omlokara babe ache jannata, yara talata nadi prabahita; e'itorae mahasaphalya
Niscaya tomara pratipalakara graeptarai ati kathora
Teraemi astitba pradana karae arau teraemi punaraarartana ghataya
niscaya te'om ksamasila, atisnehasila
Arachara adhipati, sanmanita
Te'om yi bicarae se'itorae karae
Tomara ocarata sain'yabahinira brttanta ahichene
phira'a'unara arau chamudara
Tathapi'o kaphirasakala mithyaraopa karaata lipta
arau allahe sihamtaka ke'uphalara paraa paraibestana karai ache
Prakrtate i sanmanita kora'ana
suraksita phalakata lipibad'dha
Sapata akasara arau yi raatita atmaprakasa karae
arau kihe tomaka janaba ye, ‘raatita yiye atmaprakasa karae’ seya no ki
(seya haiche) ujjbala naksatra
Pratyeka jirara oparate'i tattbabadhayaka ache
Eteke manuhe cinta karaa ucita ye, taka kiherae srsti karaa haiche
taka srsti karaa haiche drautagatita nirgata horaa panirae
yito nirgata haya meraudanda arau bukura majara paraa
Niscaya te'om taka ubhata'i anibalai saksama
Yidina gopana bisayasamuha paraiksa karaa ha’ba
se'idina tara kono sakti nathakiba arau kono sahayakarai'o nathakiba
Sapata akasara yiye barasuna dharana karae
sapata prthiraira, yito bidirna haya
niscaya e'ito (ala-kora'ana) mimansakarai bani
Arau e'ito nirarthaka nahaya
Niscaya sihamta bhisana sarayantra karae
arau mayo bhisana kausala karaicho
Eteke kaphirasakalaka arakasa diya; sihamtaka kichu samayara babe arakasa diya
Tumi tomara sumahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
yijane srsti karaiche, tara pichata suthama karaiche
Arau yijane (bhagya) nirdharana karaiche tara pichata satpatha pradarsana karaiche
arau yijane trna-lata utpanna karaiche
tara pichata se'iboraka ka'la abarjanata parainata karaiche
Anatipalame ami tomaka patha karaama, phalata tumi napaharaiba
kerala allahe yi bicarae tara bahirae. Niscaya te'om prakasya arau aprakasya sakalo jane
Arau ami tomara babe sahaja patha sugama karai dima
Eteke upadesa diya, yadi upadesa phalaprasu haya
upadesa siye'i grahana karaiba yiye bhaya karae
Arau yi hatabhagya si iyaka agraahya karaiba
si bhayabaha ju'ita praraesa karaiba
Tara pichata si tata mrtyubarano karaiba noraaraiba arau jiraita'o thakiba noraaraiba
Niscaya saphalata labha karaiba yiye atmasud'dhi karaiba
Arau tara pratipalakara nama smarana karaiba arau chalata adaya karaiba
Kintu tomaloke prthiraira jiranaka praadhan'ya diya
athaca akhiraata sarbottama arau sthayi
Niscaya iyara barnana ache purbararti chahiphasamuhata
ibraahima arau muchara chahiphasamuhata
Tomara ocarata acchannakarai (kiyamatara) sambada ahichene
se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ha’ba aranata
karmaklanta, paraisraanta
sihamta praraesa karaiba jbalanta ju'ita
uttapta utala nijaraara pani pana karaibalai diya ha’ba
sihamtara babe kamitabisista ghamhara bahirae ana kono khadya nathakiba
i sihamtara pusti'o sadhana nakaraiba arau ksudha'o nibrtta nakaraiba
Arau se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ha’ba anandojjbala
nija karmara saphalyata paraitrpta
su'ucca jannatata
tata sihamte kono anarthaka katha sunibalai napaba
tata thakiba prabahamana nijaraa
tata thakiba unnata sayyasamuha
Arau prastuta thakiba panapatrasamuha
arau sarai saraikai rakha garausamuha
arau bistrta parai thoraa dalicasamuha
ihamte utara pine drstipata nakarae neki, kenekai taka srsti karaa haiche
arau akasara phale, kenekai taka urd'dhata sthapana karaa haiche
arau parbatasamuhara phale, se'ibora kenekai pratisthita karaa haiche
arau prthiraikhanara phale, kidarae taka bistrta karaa haiche
eteke tumi upadesa diya, tumito kerala ejana upadesadata
tumi sihamtara oparata sakti prayogakarai nahaya
Kintu konoba'i mukha ghuraa'i la’le athaba kupharai karaile
tente allahe taka mahasasti pradana karaiba
Niscaya amara ocarate'i sihamtara pratyarartana
Arau sihamtara hicapa-nikaca amarae'i dayitba
Phajarara samayara sapata
sapata daha raatira
sapata yora arau biyorara
sapata raatira, yetiya i bidaya laya
Iyara majata bodhasampanna byaktira babe drrha pramana na'ine
tumi dekha na'ine, tomara pratipalake ada sampradayara lagata ki acarana karaichila
iraama gotrara lagata, yihamte adhikarai achila su'ucca prasadara
yara samatulya (jati) kono desate srsti karaa horaa na'i
arau chamuda sampradayara lagata (ki acarana karaichila) yisakale bhaiyamata sila kati ghara nirmana karaichila
arau suladandara adhikarai phira'a'unara lagata (ki acarana karaichila)
yisakale desata simalanghana karaichila
tara pichata tata asanti brd'dhi karaichila
Phalata tomara pratipalake sihamtara oparata sastira cabuka maraile
Niscaya tomara pratipalaka satarka drsti raakhe
Arau manuhara prakrti enekuraa ye, yetiya tara pratipalake taka sanmana arau anugraha pradana karai paraiksa karae, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka sanmanita karaiche’
Arau yetiya taka paraiksa karaibalai tara jiraika sankucita karai diye, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka lanchita karaiche’
Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke etimaka samadara nakaraa
Arau tomaloke micakinaka khadya pradana karaibalai parasparae parasparaka utsahita nakaraa
arau tomaloke uttaraadhikarara sampada sampurnaraupe graasa karai peloraa
arau tomaloke dhana-sampadaka atikai bhalaporaa
ketiya'o nahaya. Yetiya prthiraikhanaka curna-bicurna karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya tomara pratipalaka agamana karaiba arau phiraistasakala saraibad'dhabharae upasthita ha’ba
arau se'idina jahannamaka upasthita karaa ha’ba, se'idina manuhe smarana karaiba, kintu e'i smarana tara kona kamata ahiba
(tetiya) si ka’ba, ‘haya! E'i jiranara babe ma'i yadi kiba agraima pathalohemtena
se'idina te'omra sastira darae sasti kone'o diba noraaraiba
Arau te'omra bandhonara darae bandhona ana kone'o diba noraaraiba
He prasanta atma
tumi tomara pratipalakara ocaralai ubhati aha santusta arau santosabhajana hai
arau mora bandasakalara antarbhukta hai yoraa
arau mora jannatata praraesa karaa
Ma'i sapata karaicho e'i nagarakhanara
arau tumi e'i nagarara adhibasi
sapata janmadatara arau yito si janma diche
Nisandehe ami manuhaka srsti karaicho kathora dukha-kastara majata
Si bhabe neki ye, ketiya'o tara oparata konorae'i ksamatabana naha’ba
si kaya, 'ma'i pracura dhana-sampada nasa karaicho
Si bhabe neki ye, kone'o taka dekha na'i
tara babe ami duta caku srsti karaa na'ine
ekhana jibha arau duta omtha
arau ami taka duta patha dekhuraa'icho
Kintu si durgama giraipathata praraesa karaa na'i
Arau tomaka kihe janaba ye, durgama giraipatha ki
se'ito haiche, dasamukti
Athaba durbhiksara dinata khadyadana karaa
nikatatmiya etimaka
athaba daraidra-nispesita abharagrastaka
tara pichata si enelokara antarbhukta hai yaya yisakale imana aniche arau parasparaka dhairya dharana karaibalai upadesa diche arau upadesa diche parasparaka daya-anugraha karaibalai
e'omloke'i saubhagyasali
Arau yisakale amara ayatasamuhaka asbikara karaiche, sihamte'i hatabhagya
Sihamta abaraud'dha ju'ita paraibestita thakiba
Sapata suryara arau tara poharara
sapata candrara yetiya i suryara pichata abirbhara haya
dinara sapata yetiya suryaka prakasa karae
raatira sapata yetiya i suryaka acchadita karae
sapata akasara arau se'i sattara yijane iyaka nirmana karaiche
prthiraira sapata arau yijane iyaka bistrta karaiche
sapata naphachara arau yijane iyaka subin'yasta karaiche
tara pichata iyaka tara satkamara arau asatkamara jnana dana karaiche
nisandehe siye'i saphala haiche yiye nijake paraitra karaiche
Arau siye'i byartha haiche, yiye nijake kalusita karaiche
Chamuda sampradaye abadhyatabasata asbikara karaichila
Yetiya sihamtara majara hatabhagya byaktijana tatpara hai uthila
tetiya allahara raachule sihamtaka ka'le, 'allahara utajanika arau ta'ira pani khoraa samparke saradhana horaa
Kintu sihamte asbikara karaile arau utajanika badha karaile. Phalata sihamtara papara babe sihamtara pratipalake sihamtaka samule dhbansa karai ekakara karai dile
Arau te'om iyara parainamaka bhaya nakarae
Sapata raatira, yetiya i acchanna karae
sapata dinara, yetiya i ujjbala haya
arau sapata se'i sattara, yijane nara arau narai srsti karaiche
Niscaya tomalokara karmapracesta bibhinna prakrtira
Eteke konoba'i dana karaile arau takbaraa aralambana karaile
arau yi uttama taka satya buli grahana karaile
ami tara babe sahaja pathata cala sugama karai dima
Arau konoba'i krpanali karaile arau nijake amukhapeksi bhabile
arau yi uttama taka asbikara karaile
ami tara babe kathina pathata cala sugama karai dima
Arau tara sampada tara kono kamata nahiba, yetiya si dhbansa ha’ba
Niscaya pathapradarsana karaatorae amara kartabya
Niscaya amiye'i parakala arau ihakalara malika
Eteke ami tomalokaka lelihana ju'i samparke satarka karai dicho
Tata praraesa karaiba kerala se'i byakti yi ha’ba carama hatabhagya
Yiye asbikara karaiche arau mukha ghuraa'i laiche
Arau iyara paraa duraaita rakha ha’ba parama muttakbi byaktika
yiye atmasud'dhira babe nija sampada dana karae
arau tara prati karao ene anugraha na'i yara pratidana diba lagiba
kerala tara mahana pratipalakara santustira pratyasata
arau anatipalame si santusti labha karaiba
Purbahnara sapata
sapata raatira, yetiya i andhakaraacchanna haya
Tomara pratipalake tomaka paraityaga karaa na'i arau asantusta'o horaa na'i
Niscaya tomara babe parabarti samaya purbararti samayatakai uttama
Niscaya anatipalame tomara pratipalake tomaka anugraha pradana karaiba, phalata tumi santusta ha’ba
Te'om tomaka anatha arasthata poraa nachilane? Tara pichata teraemi tomaka asraya diche
Arau te'om tomaka pa'ichila pathaharaa arasthata, tara pichata toraemi tomaka pathanirdesa diche
Arau te'om tomaka pa'ichila sambalahina daraidraraupe, tara pichata teraemi abharamukta karaile
Eteke tumi etimara (anathara) prati kathora naha’ba
Arau bhikharaika dhamaka nidiba
Arau tomara pratipalakara anugrahara katha pracara karaa
Ami tomara (kalyanara) babe tomara buku prasasta karai diya na'ine
arau ami tomara paraa tomara boja apasarana karaa na'ine
yi boja'i tomara pithi bhani pela'ichila
arau amiye'i tomara (maryada brd'dhira) babe tomara smaranaka samunnata karaicho
Eteke dukhara lagate'i ache sukha
niscaya dukhara lagate'i ache sukha
Eteke yetiya'i tumi arasara poraa tetiya'i kathora ibadatata atmaniyoga karaa
Arau tomara pratipalakara prati gabhira manoyogi horaa
Sapata tina arau yayatunara
sapata cina'i parbatara
sapata e'i niraapada nagarakhanara
niscaya ami manuhaka sarbottama gathanata srsti karaicho
tara pichata ami taka hinatagrasthasakalara hinatamata parainata karaicho
kerala se'isakala lokara bahirae yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche; te'omlokara babe ache aphuranta subha pratidana
Eteke (he manara!) Iyara pichato kihe tomaka karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi karai tule
allahe'i bicarakasakalara majata sarbasraestha bicaraka nahayane barau
parha tomara pratipalakara namata, yiye srsti karaiche
te'om manuhaka alakbara paraa srsti karaiche
Parha, karana tomara pratipalaka mahamahima
Yijane kalamara sahayata siksa diche
Te'om manuhaka ene siksa diche, yito manuhe jana nachila
Bastarate, manuhe simalanghana karai thake
Karana si nijake sbanirbharasila buli bharae
Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i pratyarartana
Tumi taka dekha na'ine? Yiye nisedha karae
Ejana bandaka, yetiya te'om chalata adaya karae
Koraacona, yadi'o te'om hidayatara oparata pratisthita
athaba takbaraara nirdesa diye; (tathapi'o te'omka kenekai badha diye)
koraacona yadi si (nisedhakarai) asbikara karae arau mukha ghuraa'i laya
si najane neki, niscaya allahe dekhi ache
ketiya'o nahaya, yadi si birata nathake, tente niscaya ami taka agaculita dharai tani anima
Michaliya, papisthara agaculi (kapala)
Eteke si nija paraisadaka mati anaka
Anatipalame ami mati anima jahannamara kathora praharaisakalaka
Ketiya'o nahaya, tumi tara anusarana nakaraiba. Arau tumi (tomara pratipalakaka) chajada karaa arau naikatya labha karaa
Niscaya ami iyaka la'ilatula kbadarata aratirna karaicho
tumi ki janiba la'ilatula kbadara ki
la'ilatula kbadara ehejara mahatakaiyo sraestha
Se'i raatita phiraistasakala arau rauha te'omlokara pratipalakara anumatikrame yaratiya sid'dhanta lai aratarana karae
Santimaya se'i raati, phajarara abirbhara nohoraalaike (santi bistrta thake)
Ahale kitabasakalara majata yisakale kupharai karaiche arau musbaraikasakala, sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana nahalaike sihamte birata thakibalai prastuta nachila
Allahara taraphara paraa ejana raachula, yijane tilaraata karai sunaba paraitra patrasamuha
Ya’ta ache sathika bidhibad'dha bidhana
Arau yisakalaka kitaba diya haichila sihamte bibhakta ha’la sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana ahara pichata

Arau sihamtaka kerala e'i nirdesa diya haichila ye, sihamte yena allahara ibadata karae te'omra babe'i yena dbinaka ekanistha karae arau yena chalata pratistha karae arau yakata pradana karae, arau e'itorae'i haiche sathika dbina
Niscaya ahale kitabasakalara majara yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamta arau musbaraikasakala jahannamara ju'ita sthayibharae arasthana karaiba; e'omloke'i haiche nikrsta srsti
Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau neka kama karaiche, te'omloke'i haiche srstira sraestha

Te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata te'omlokara puraskara ache sthayi jannata, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata te'omloke cirakala thakiba. Allaha te'omlokara prati santusta arau te'omloke'o te'omra prati santusta. E'ito tara babe, yiye nija pratipalakaka bhaya karae
Yetiya prabala kampanata prthiraikhana prakampita ha’ba
arau prthiraiye tara bhitarata thaka bojabora uliya'i diba
arau manuhe ka’ba, iyara ki ha’la
se'idina prthiraiye tara brttanta barnana karaiba
karana tomara pratipalake taka nirdesa diche
se'idina manuhe bhin bhin dalata ola'i ahiba yate sihamtaka sihamtara krtakarmabora dekhuraaba paraa yaya
eteke yiye anu paraimana satkama karaiche seya si dekhibalai paba
Arau yiye anu paraimana asatkama karaiche seya'o si dekhibalai paba
Sapata urdhbasbasata daurai yoraa ghomraasamuhara
yiborae ksurara aghatata phirainati urauraaya
yiborae prabhatakalata akramana karae
phalata sihamte iyara dbaraa dhuli urauraaya
arau iyara dbaraa satrau dalara abhyantarata soma'i parae
Niscaya manuha tara pratipalakara prati atikai akrtajna
niscaya si e'i bisaye saksi
arau niscaya si dhana-sampadara lobhata prabala
Si najane neki ye, kabarata yi ache seya ut'thita ha’ba
Arau antarata yi ache seya prakasita ha’ba
niscaya sihamtara pratipalaka se'idina sihamtara arastha samparke sabisesa arahita
Bhitiprada maha bipada
Bhitiprada maha bipada ki
bhitiprada maha bipada samparke tumi ki jana
se'idina manuha ha’ba biksipta kita-patangara darae
Arau parbatasamuha ha’ba dhuna rangina unara darae
Eteke yara tarjusamuha gadhura ha’ba
te'om thakiba santosajanaka jiranata
arau yara tarjusamuha patala ha’ba
tara thikana ha’ba ‘ha-raiyaha’
Arau tumi ki jana se'itono ki
i eta atyanta uttapta agnikunda
Praacuryara pratiyogitaya tomalokaka amanoyogi karai raakhiche
Yetiyalaike tomaloke kabarata upanita nohoraa
Ketiya'o nahaya, ati sonakale tomaloke janibalai paba
Akau ketiya'o nahaya, ati sonakale tomaloke janibalai paba
Ketiya'o nahaya, yadi tomaloke niscitabharae janilahemtena
Niscaya tomaloke jahima (jahannama) dekhiba
Akau, niscaya tomaloke iyaka patiyana yoraakai dekhiba
Tara pichata se'idina arasya'i tomalokaka niyamata samparke prasna karaa ha’ba
Samayara sapata
niscaya manuha ksatigrasthatata nipatita
kintu te'omlokara bahirae, yisakale imana aniche arau satkama karaiche lagate (yisakale) parasparaka satyara upadesa diye arau dhairya dharana karaibalai utsaha diye
Durbhoga pratyeka se'i byaktira babe yiye sanmukhata arau anupasthitita paraninda karae
Yiye sampada jama karae arau barae barae ganana karae
Si dharana karae ye, tara sampade taka cirajirai karai raakhiba
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya si hutamata niksipta ha’ba
Arau tumi janane, hutama ki
i allahara prajbalita ju'i
Yiye hrdapindaka graasa karaiba
Niscaya i sihamtaka arad'dha karai raakhiba
Okha okha stambhasamuhata
Tumi dekha na'ine, tomara pratipalake hatira adhipatisakalara lagata ki karaichila
te'om sihamtara sarhayantra byarthatata paryabasita karaa na'ine
Arau sihamtara biraud'dhe te'om jake jake caraa'i pathi'oraa nachilane
yisakale sihamtara oparata paka tana matira silaguti niksepa karaichila
phalata te'om sihamtaka bhaksita trna-sadrsa karaichila
Yihetu kburaa'ichasakala abhyasta
sita arau graismakalara bhramanata sihamtara asakti ache
Eteke sihamte yena e'i gharara pratipalakara ibadata karae
Yijane sihamtaka ksudha arasthata khadya pradana karaiche arau santraasara paraa niraapatta diche
Tumi taka dekhichane yiye hicapa pratidanaka asbikara karae
si se'ijane'i, yiye anathaka kathorabharae khedi pathiyaya
arau si dukhiyaka khana khuraabalai utsaha nidiye
Eteke dhbansa se'ibidha chalata adayakaraisakalara
yisakale nijara chalatata amanoyogi
yisakale anaka dekhuraabalaihe karae
arau sarau-suraa grhasamagrai pradanata badha diye
Niscaya ami tomaka ala-ka'uchara pradana karaichom
Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara uddesye chalata adaya karaa arau korabani karaa
Niscaya tomara prati bidbesa posanakaraiye'i nirbansa
Koraa, ‘he kaphirasakala
tomaloke yara ibadata karaa, ma'i tara ibadata nakaraom
arau ma'i yara ibadata karaom, tomaloke te'omra ibadatakarai nahaya
arau ma'i tara ibadatakarai nahaya yara ibadata tomaloke karaa
Arau ma'i yara ibadata karaom tomaloke'o tara ibadatakarai nahaya
Tomalokara dbina tomalokara babe, arau mora dbina mora babe
Yetiya allahara sahaya arau bijaya ahiba
arau tumi manuhaka dale dale allahara dbinata praraesa karaote dekhiba
tetiya tumi tomara pratipalakara prasansasaha te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaiba arau te'omra ocarata ksama praarthana karaiba, niscaya te'om ta'oba grahanakarai
Dhbansa ha'oka abu lahabara duyo hata arau si nije'o dhbansa haiche
Tara dhana-sampada arau tara uparjana tara kono kamata nahila
Atisighrae'i si lelihana ju'ita patita ha’ba
Arau tara strai'o- yijaniye indhana bahana karae
Ta'ira dinita thakiba pakoraa tana rachi
Koraa, ‘te'om allaha, eka-adbitiya
allaha haiche chamada; (te'om karao mukhapeksi nahaya, sakalo te'omrae'i mukhapeksi)
te'om kako janma diya na'i arau teraom janma loraa na'i
arau te'omra samatulya kono na'i’
Koraa, ma'i asraya bicarao usara pratipalakara
Te'om yi srsti karaiche tara anistara paraa
arau raatira andhakarara anistara paraa, yetiya i gabhira haya
arau se'isakala naraira anistara paraa yisakale gamthita phum diye
arau hinsukara anistara paraa, yetiya si hinsa karae
Koraa- ma'i manuhara pratipalakara asraya praarthana karaichom
manuhara adhipatira
manuhara ilahara ocarata
atmagopanakarai kumantranadatara anistara paraa
yiye manuhara manata kumantrana diye
jinara majara paraa arau manuhara majara paraa
